name: Masked Rider, The - Kamen Rider ZO [SCD]
description:
The Masked Rider: Kamen Rider ZO is an action game.
You can play The Masked Rider: Kamen Rider ZO on SEGA CD.
Eric Quakenbush, Hori Nagafumi and Satoshi Kubo produced the game. It was directed by Keita Amemiya. It was scored by Kawamura Eiji.
